title: Callaghan is back (1961, Crime) Antony Wright, Geneviève Kervine | French Film

sources.title: Callaghan is back (1961, Crime) Antony Wright, Geneviève Kervine | French Film
sources.description:
The wrestling racket is exploited by a couple of adventurers, the Baron - Ray Rollando - and Ruby la Dorure. During a match rigged by the two accomplices, in which "the White-Toothed Mask", "the Justice of the Beyond" and "the Arizona Bearded Man", terror of the Prairie, clash, Slim Callaghan confuses them by substituting himself for the White-Toothed Mask. Duped, the Baron and his gang swear revenge. Slim Callaghan then sets his sights on a new, even more high-profile case, the notorious theft of the High Sangha diamonds. With the help of his pretty blonde secretary Carola, Callaghan boards a luxury yacht in the Mediterranean. From there, he enters a sumptuous villa where a transvestite party is taking place. Carola, disguised as a fakir, and himself a Salvation Army auxiliary, steal the precious diamonds in an illusionist's trick. A frenzied chase, full of incredible twists and turns, unmasks the perpetrators of this colossal swindle. This eventful investigation is a success for Callaghan, both professionally, as he arrests a fearsome bandit, and personally, as his secretary becomes his charming wife.

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/cd5Gs0X-nXw

Original title: Callaghan remet ça (1961)
Alternative title: Callaghan is back 

Director: Willy Rozier
Writers: Peter Cheyney, Willy Rozier
Actors: Antony Wright, Geneviève Kervine, André Luguet, Fabienne Dali
Genres: French cinema, Crime, Drama
